description: This cavatelli and broccoli recipe is made with vegan sausage and absolutely delicious. Bonus is that it is made in only one pot!
keywords: healthy pasta recipe, one pot pasta
name: Cavatelli and Broccoli Recipe with Vegan Sausage
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces cavatelli pasta (, or other pasta of choice (gluten free if needed)
4 cups 12 ounces broccoli (, cut into pieces)
Drizzle of olive oil or broth for sautéing
1 cup veggie broth (, low sodium if needed)
1/4 cup white wine (, or broth if you don’t use wine)
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice (, add more if more tang)
1/2 teaspoon sea salt (, leave out or adjust if you use sausage)
3 tablespoons brown rice flour (, or regular flour if you don’t need gluten free)
1/2 cup vegan Parmesan cheese (, optional (homemade or store bought)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to package directions, except stop it when there is two minutes less than the package says.
Add the broccoli and bring to a boil, checking along the way for doneness of both pasta and broccoli. We like ours al dente. Broccoli will be a vibrant green when ready.
Drain all into a pasta strainer.
In the same pot, add the garlic with the drizzle of oil or broth. Sauté over medium low heat until fragrant.
Add in the broth, wine, lemon, salt, and flour. Whisk well.
Once thick, add in the pasta with broccoli and mix well. Add in the sausage, Parmesan and/or crushed red pepper if using.
